cat:codelistItem.xlink:title: Code list items for IE_GeolocationSourceCode from the Image and Gridded Data (igd) Namespace

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: Method for geometric correction carried out on imagery

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: Method for geometric correction carried out on imagery

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: Source of geolocation information is based on DEM

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: Source of geolocation information is based on DEM

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: Source of geolocation information is based on Ground Control Point

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: Source of geolocation information is based on Ground Control Point

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: Source of geolocation information is from system parameters of the observation system

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: Source of geolocation information is from system parameters of the observation system

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: Source of geolocation information is based on the combination of system parameters of the observation system and an existing DEM

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: Source of geolocation information is based on the combination of system parameters of the observation system and an existing DEM

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: Source of geolocation information is based on the combination of system parameters of the observation system and Ground Control Point

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: Source of geolocation information is based on the combination of system parameters of the observation system and Ground Control Point

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: Source of geolocation information is based on the combination of system parameters of the observation system, Ground Control Point and an existing DEM

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: Source of geolocation information is based on the combination of system parameters of the observation system, Ground Control Point and an existing DEM

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: Source of geolocation information is based on the combination of Ground Control Point and DEM

cat:codelistItem.xlink:title: Code list items for GeometricCorrectionModel from the Image and Gridded Data (igd) Namespace

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: Model for geometric correction of imagery and gridded data

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: Model for geometric correction of imagery and gridded data

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: Functional relationship between ground and image coordinates based on the correlation between a set of ground control points and their corresponding image coordinates, as defined in ISO/TS 19130

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: Functional relationship between ground and image coordinates based on the correlation between a set of ground control points and their corresponding image coordinates, as defined in ISO/TS 19130

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: Sensor model based on the physical configuration of a sensing system, as defined in ISO/TS 19130

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: Sensor model based on the physical configuration of a sensing system, as defined in ISO/TS 19130

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: Model using functions whose coefficients are based on a physical sensor model, as defined in ISO/TS 19130

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: Model using functions whose coefficients are based on a physical sensor model, as defined in ISO/TS 19130

cat:codelistItem.xlink:title: Code list items for IE_RadiometricCalibrationTypeCode from the Image and Gridded Data (igd) Namespace

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: Type for radiometric correction carried on imagery

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: Type for radiometric correction carried on imagery

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: A data preprocessing technique used to eliminate radiometric problems in images with model atmosphere in conjunction with in situ atmospheric measurements

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: A data preprocessing technique used to eliminate radiometric problems in images with model atmosphere in conjunction with in situ atmospheric measurements

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: A data preprocessing technique used to eliminate radiometric problems in images by multiple looks at same object from different vantage points

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: A data preprocessing technique used to eliminate radiometric problems in images by multiple looks at same object from different vantage points

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: Processing actions carried out on image

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: Processing actions carried out on image

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: A processing to adjust images more suitable for display or further image analysis by sharpening, brightening or other relative operations

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: A processing to adjust images more suitable for display or further image analysis by sharpening, brightening or other relative operations

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: A processing to fuse more than two images into one

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: A processing to fuse more than two images into one

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: A processing to remove noise of an image

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: A processing to remove noise of an image

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: Type of an optical image

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: Type of an optical image

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: Imagery with hundreds of narrow spectral bands acquired by a hyperspectral instrument

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: A single band image generally displayed as shades of grey

cat:codelistItem.xlink:title: Code list items for IE_OpticalSensorTypeCode from the Image and Gridded Data (igd) Namespace

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: Type of an optical sensor

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: Type of an optical sensor

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: Sensor that detects and collects all of the data for an image (frame/rectangle) at an instant of time

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: Sensor that detects and collects all of the data for an image (frame/rectangle) at an instant of time

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: Sensor that collects a single cross-track image line at one time and constructs a larger image from a set of adjacent lines resulting from the along-track motion of the sensor

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: Sensor that collects a single cross-track image line at one time and constructs a larger image from a set of adjacent lines resulting from the along-track motion of the sensor

cat:definition.gco:CharacterString: Sensor that sweeps a detector forming cross-track image line(s) and constructs a larger image from a set of adjacent lines using the along-track motion of the sensor’s collection platform

cat:description.gco:CharacterString: Sensor that sweeps a detector forming cross-track image line(s) and constructs a larger image from a set of adjacent lines using the along-track motion of the sensor’s collection platform
